entities.name: reptile house
entities.description: The place where people were screaming and running for exits.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A snake that was slithering out of the reptile house.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The person who heard a low, hissing voice from the snake.

entities.name: Brazil
entities.description: A place mentioned by the snake in its hissing voice.

entities.name: keeper of the reptile house
entities.description: The person who was in shock and kept saying 'where did the glass go?'

entities.name: zoo director
entities.description: The person who apologized to Aunt Petunia over and over again.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: The person who was given a cup of strong sweet tea by the zoo director.

entities.name: Piers
entities.description: One of Harry's cousins who was gibbering and swearing about the snake.

entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Harry's other cousin who was also gibbering and exaggerating about the snake.

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle who waited until Piers was safely out of the house.

relationships.description: The snake said 'Brazil, here I come ... Thanksss, amigo.'
The keeper kept saying 'where did the glass go?'
The zoo director made Aunt Petunia a cup of strong sweet tea.
Piers was swearing that the snake tried to squeeze him to death.
